tweets.content:
fully out of pump 

i sold what will probably be close to the bottom wick yesterday in a moment of panic. tbh i was irresponsible managing the position. was super risk on with a significant amount of money i have to pay in taxes in about ~3 days 

idk what they tell you to do when â€œgoodâ€ bags are down 75% in 5 minutes but all rational thinking goes out the window. so i did what i thought i should do -> panic dump the nuke 

iâ€™m def a little upset at myself for allowing a situation where im a forced seller at the bottom but here we are 

pump was going to be a top trade ever for me and was close to 7 figs in upnl at the top but i still leave in profit and cant be upset about it especially after what just happened  

broadly speaking yesterday is probably the worst day ive ever seen on this app? iâ€™m still trying to read everything (pls share) to digest exactly how this is possible? i wasnâ€™t really conscious for may 21 so i donâ€™t have the best proxy to compare it to

i donâ€™t really have some legendary loss porn story for you where i made it again after losing a hero number but iâ€™ve lost it all many times since iâ€™ve been full time trading. most recently with goat in 2024

all i can say is you live to fight another day. the sun still rises, the market still trades and there will always be another opportunity to make it by existing here long enough 

no stream today or tomorrow -> but i will be back monday with the regularly scheduled show. 

feels a little weird to have been celebrating a successful stream yesterday and then watch the market fall off a fucking cliff 

no matter what iâ€™m gonna say the same thing i always say on stream. my only goal is to help my viewers get smarter and make it. iâ€™m gonna do everything in my power to make that mantra a reality and bring on the best people to help you (us) recover stay optimistic about the future and push onwards 

if you feel completely lost and have nobody to talk to come hangout in our twitch chat. itâ€™s genuinely become family and thereâ€™s some incredible people in there that are here for you

anyways i didnt really wanna make a long post as i donâ€™t think i have a ton to add to the discourse right now where relevant info is all that matters . 

but it felt right to close off this pump thread in public the way it started

so im fully out (for now) and sold the panic. it happens. only way is up

"Depending on the day and time, the flippening is already happening. If you want to trade openly, use Hyperliquid. If you want some level of privacy and broader deposit support, use Aster"
tweets.author: notthreadguy

tweets.content:
This is something that 95% of crypto twitter could benefit from hearing:

> CZ didn't make his first million until he was 39
> He didn't launch Binance until he was 40
> You can work/learn/fail for a decade and still win

Crypto is the one of the only places left where it's possible to make it overnight.

But that doesn't mean you should hyper-focus on it.

Play the long game, you have time.
